name: Powerful
desc: You've always been stronger than most, and what would be a heavy burden for another barely phases you.

art.name: Overwhelming Strength
art.desc: You unleash your strength, decimating the terrain and flinging creatures away.

abilities.name: Shove
abilities.effect: Inflict _Push_ [5 _Grit_] on a Target within Range. This Attack is always treated as a _Hit_.
abilities.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add an additional Target. You may repeat this _Boost_.

abilities.name: Collateral Damage
abilities.effect: Repeat the Attack against an _Obstacle_ at the same _Position_ as the Target, dealing +3 Damage.
abilities.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Use this _Gambit_ even if you did not qualify for one.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.effect: Deal +1 _Bonus Damage_ and inflict _Push_ [6 _Grit_]/_Prone_ [4 _Grit_/_Reflex_]/_Sundered_ [4 _Reflex_] on one Target.
abilities.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Use this _Gambit_ even if you did not qualify for one.

effect: You are incredibly strong, and can reliably light twice as much as a normal person, allowing you to accomplish all but the most impressive feats of mundane strength without any significant effort. When using brute strength or physical power you may spend one ▢ as if it were ⊟ or to play *Efficacy* if appropriate.

name: Agile
desc: You're light and sure on your feet, moving from place to place in a flash.
effect: You are fleet of foot and move more swiftly than others. Unless otherwise disadvantaged, you will always move quicker than other people, and can reliably keep up with some animals. When using agility or speed you may spend one ▢ as if it were ⊟ or to play *Speed* if appropriate.

name: Keen
desc: Your senses are sharper than most, allowing you notice details that others miss.
effect: You have sharp senses that are closer to an animals than a humans. You can notice fine details ignored by most when using any of your five senses. When your keen senses would be advantageous you may spend one ▢ as if it were ⊟ or to play *Observation* if appropriate.

name: Tough
desc: You are a hardy creature that can take more punishment than most.
